sentences.en: A lizard on a cushion will still seek leaves.
sentences.cn: 坐垫上的蜥蜴还会找树叶.

sentences.en: A lizard will regenerate its tail if it's cut off.
sentences.cn: 蜥蜴的尾巴如被切掉,它会重新生出一条尾巴.

sentences.en: But, of the vertebrates, unpredictable Nature selected only snakes ( and one lizard ).
sentences.cn: 但是, 在脊椎动物中, 神秘莫测的大自然只选择了蛇 ( 和一种蜥蜴 ).

sentences.en: Confident in its camouflage, being the same colour as the rocks, the lizard stands still when it feels danger.
sentences.cn: 由于和岩石颜色一样，蜥蜴对自己的保护色充满信心；遇到危险时，它便一动不动。

sentences.en: In the lizard, a muscular septum partially divides the ventricle.
sentences.cn: 在虫蜴中, 肌肉质的隔膜把心室部分地隔开.

sentences.en: Jeanie: A lizard! Ugh, that would give me the creeps.
sentences.cn: 珍妮: 蜥蜴! 哎呀, 这会让我毛骨悚然.

sentences.en: Komodo dragon is the largest living lizard and a fearsome predator.
sentences.cn: 科摩多龙是目前存在的最大蜥蜴,它是一种令人恐惧的捕食性动物.

sentences.en: Meetings are just one symptom of an organization run by the lizard brain.
sentences.cn: 会海只是这类靠蜥蜴脑运作的组织的一个症状。

sentences.en: Meetings are just one symptom of anorganization run by the lizard brain.
sentences.cn: 会海只是这类靠蜥蜴脑运作的组织的一个症状。

sentences.en: Neither the lizard nor the glass has any secrets.
sentences.cn: 无论是蜥蜴还是玻璃，都没有任何秘密。

sentences.en: Northern Australia is a hotbed of exotic animals, including the frilled lizard.
sentences.cn: 北澳大利亚是奇异动物的温床, 包括皱褶蜥蜴.

sentences.en: Start early - roaming 5 man controlling dragon, golem and lizard.
sentences.cn: 尽早开始漫游5人控制的龙, 魔像和蜥蜴.

sentences.en: The lizard darted out its tongue at the insect.
sentences.cn: 蜥蜴伸出舌头去吃小昆虫.

sentences.en: The lizard's tongue flicked out and caught a mosquito.
sentences.cn: 蜥蜴突然伸出舌头,捉到一只蚊子.

sentences.en: The poor little lizard, Bill, was in the middle.
sentences.cn: 那只可怜的小壁虎比尔在当中.

sentences.en: The serpent coils in the grass of the streets, the lizard basks in the solitary halls.
sentences.cn: 毒蛇盘绕在街头的草丛中, 蜥蜴在残败的大厅中自由爬行.

sentences.en: The slow-worm is in fact not a snake but a legless lizard.
sentences.cn: 蛇蜥其实不是蛇，而是无脚的蜥蜴。

sentences.en: There are about a dozen species of glass lizard in the world.
sentences.cn: 世界上大约有12种玻璃蜥蜴.

sentences.en: When air cools at night, dew collects on the lizard's skin and is pulled to its mouth by capillary action.
sentences.cn: 待晚间空气温度下降，凝结在蜥蜴皮肤上的露珠就可以通过毛细管作用输送到它的口中。

trans.tran_en: a type of reptile that has four legs and a long tail
